data.title: John Wayne Birthplace and Museum, Historic Site in Winterset, IA
data.meta_description: The John Wayne Birthplace and Museum in Winterset, Iowa is a popular destination that attracts over a million visitors. It recently opened a new addition, making it the largest exhibit of John Wayne artifacts in the world. The museum is dedicated to honoring the iconic actor's legacy and offers a diverse collection of photos, memorabilia, a movie theater, and a gift shop. To celebrate its 40th anniversary, the museum is hosting a special event called A Salute to the Armed Forces, featuring screenings of Wayne's war movies, live music, vintage military aircraft, and reenactors. The museum also offers membership benefits, including free tour tickets and early access to exclusive items and events. Visitors can also purchase books and merchandise celebrating John Wayne's life and career.
